recipe.title: Chicken Tikka Masala
recipe.description: Tender chicken in a rich, creamy tomato-based curry sauce

steps.descr: Marinate chicken in yogurt and half the tikka paste for 30 minutes
steps.instructions: Marinate chicken in yogurt and half the tikka paste for 30 minutes

on_enter.say: Right, let's get started by marinating our chicken in the yogurt and half of the tikka paste. We'll let it soak up all those lovely flavors for thirty minutes.

steps.descr: Grill or pan-fry chicken until charred and cooked through
steps.instructions: Grill or pan-fry chicken until charred and cooked through

on_enter.say: Now, let's grill or pan-fry the chicken until it's beautifully charred and cooked through. You should hear a nice sizzle!

steps.descr: In a large pan, sauté onions until golden, add garlic
steps.instructions: In a large pan, sauté onions until golden, add garlic

on_enter.say: Let's heat up a large pan and sauté those onions until they're golden and lovely. Then, we'll add the garlic for that aromatic touch.

steps.descr: Stir in remaining tikka paste and cook for 1 minute
steps.instructions: Stir in remaining tikka paste and cook for 1 minute

on_enter.say: Now, let's stir in the remaining tikka paste and cook it for a minute. This will really bring out those spices.

steps.descr: Add tinned tomatoes and simmer for 10 minutes
steps.instructions: Add tinned tomatoes and simmer for 10 minutes

on_enter.say: Let's add the tinned tomatoes now and let it all simmer for ten minutes. You'll see it start to thicken up nicely.

steps.descr: Stir in cream and cooked chicken, simmer for 5 minutes
steps.instructions: Stir in cream and cooked chicken, simmer for 5 minutes

on_enter.say: Now, let's stir in the cream and our beautifully cooked chicken. We'll let it simmer for another five minutes to get all those flavors mingling.

steps.descr: Garnish with fresh coriander and serve with rice or naan
steps.instructions: Garnish with fresh coriander and serve with rice or naan

on_enter.say: Finally, let's garnish with some fresh coriander and serve it up with rice or naan. Enjoy your delicious Chicken Tikka Masala!

notes.text: Marinating overnight gives better flavor. Don't skip the charring step - it adds smoky depth. Adjust spice level to your taste.
